Name: Pierre Collins
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 3 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: A Tom Collins made with cognac. Cognac's character shines through.
Nutrition: One serving of Pierre Collins contains 187 calories
